Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dimension EXL integrated chemistry system with LOCI Module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LOCI Thyroid Calibrator used for calibrating FT3, FT4L, and TSHL assays on the Dimension EXL system.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic calibrator for the calibration of the LOCI Free Triiodothyronine (FT3), LOCI Free Thyroxine (FT4L), and LOCI Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSHL) methods on the Dimension EXL integrated chemistry system with LOCI Module.
